name: Take a Hike!
description: Use AllTrails to find a great hike near you!
alt: A couple hiking over a beautiful mountain ridge

name: Adopt a Pet!
description: Really bored? And often? Help rescue a pet in need of a good home! You won't be bored, we promise!
alt: Young puppy and kitten sitting in a field, looking incredibly adorable

name: Scavenger Hunt - Couples
description: Tired of spending date nights on the couch watching Netflix? Check out this awesome scavenger hunt and other date night ideas from The Dating Divas. They include a free PDF to get started with!
alt: The Dating Divas collection of date night scavenger hunt included activities

name: Bicycle Date Ideas
description: Need to get out, but don't want to leave your true love? Take a romantic bike ride with your significant other! This article has 10 unique ideas to explore while riding your bikes.
alt: A couple riding their bikes alongside a metropolitan river with the sun reflecting off the water
